segments.text: Besides , yours don't have side pockets like mine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cool ! They're big ! What have you got in there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you planning a trip to the Outback ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but you never know when you'll need a flashlight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , my pants are very slimming . They're capris .
segments.speaker: S2
